name: Bunker at Day Zero
description:
You live in a bunker, and must scavenge for power sources in this post apocalyptic world and manage the people that live in the bunker. Every piece of equipment requires power, and all occupants require power to live.

Monitor and manage all your occupants' needs by right-clicking and dragging to rotate the camera, and zooming in and out using the scroll wheel, then left-clicking on characters and other objects to determine what needs to be powered for the day.

This game was made a part of Ludum Dare #39, with the theme being "Running out of Power": https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/bunker-at-day-zero
